tool_description: Analyzes ingredient lists of hair care products to check compatibility with hair type, identify beneficial ingredients, and flag potential irritants.

product_ingredients.description: List of ingredients in the product

error_messages: Empty ingredients list: Must provide at least one ingredient
Too many ingredients: Maximum 50 ingredients can be analyzed at once
Invalid hair type: Hair type must be a valid classification
Invalid sensitivity level: Scalp sensitivity must be a valid level classification
usage: Input the ingredient list from a product, your hair type, scalp sensitivity level, and any known allergies to get compatibility analysis.

beneficial_ingredients.description: Ingredients that are good for this hair type

usage_recommendations.description: How to use this product safely
